member.param: Byte array containing the image data.
The maximum width of the scaled image.

If true, the image will be scaled while maintaining its original aspect ratio. The image will be scaled to fit within the bounds defined by .

member.name: M:BeatSaberMarkupLanguage.GameplaySetup.GameplaySetup.RemoveTab(System.String)

member.name: T:BeatSaberMarkupLanguage.Harmony_Patches.FixViewControllerModalHide
member.summary: This patch makes modal views disable immediately when the parent view controller is deactivated no matter what. The base game behavior is to only immediately disable them if the screen system is being disabled, which causes the view to stick around if the view controller is simply being dismissed since the animation coroutine can't complete before the view controller GameObject is disabled.
member.remarks: This currently replaces the !screenSystemDisabling passed as the argument for animate in the call to with just false.

member.name: T:BeatSaberMarkupLanguage.Harmony_Patches.FlowCoordinator_PresentFlowCoordinator
member.summary: Since we add the on the left side of the main menu, the default horizontal animation makes the center view controller clip our view controller. This forces the in/out animations of the to to avoid this.

member.name: P:BeatSaberMarkupLanguage.Util.ZenjectSingleton`1.Instance
member.summary: Gets the current instance of this class registered with Zenject.
member.exception: Thrown if this property is accessed when the main menu hasn't yet initialized.
member.remarks: If you are using Zenject, consider injecting the instance of this class directly rather than using this property.
